text: Helianthus dissectifolius is a rare species of sunflower, endemic to Mexico. It is found only in the states of Chihuahua and Durango in north-central Mexico.Jackson, Raymond Carl 1963. Brittonia 15: 268. ==References== dissectifolius Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Plants described in 1902
title: Helianthus dissectifolius
